last_episode_to_air.name: Pathar
last_episode_to_air.overview: In the emotionally charged finale, the true monster behind the acid attack is unveiled, exposing the harrowing consequences of patriarchal oppression and collective guilt in society.

name: Kaalkoot
overview: Follows the life of Ravishankar Tripathi, a tenacious and dedicated police officer who finds himself at the forefront of a challenging acid attack case.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Portrays the life of a determined police officer trying to bust an acid attack case while juggling his work-life balance.

episodes.name: Janam Din
episodes.overview: Ravi Shankar Tripathi, an under-confident sub-inspector, is unwilling to marry and doubts his career in the police force. A chance encounter with Parul, an acid attack victim, sparks a series of events that will change his life.

episodes.name: M for Mafia
episodes.overview: The encounter with Parul transforms Ravi, igniting a newfound determination to catch her attacker. The thrilling investigation begins, challenging Ravi to question every assumption and delve into the darkest corners of the crime.

episodes.name: Rocky
episodes.overview: Ravi confronts societal biases against women and toxic masculinity that add hurdles to the inquiry. His colleagues' fixed notions about the case further complicate matters, forcing Ravi to push against the tide.

episodes.name: Nail Polish
episodes.overview: Clues emerge, pointing to potential suspects - a jilted lover, an unknown stranger, or a chilling psycho.

episodes.name: Dus Nabbey
episodes.overview: The intensity of the investigation escalates, revealing the deep-rooted gender inequality and systemic flaws plaguing society. Ravi finds himself entangled in a web of manipulation and deception as he strives to outsmart the culprit.

episodes.name: Ardhsatya
episodes.overview: As Ravi inches closer to the truth, the threats against him intensify. The puzzle grows more intricate, and he grapples with conflicting leads, leaving him bewildered about the identity of the attacker.

episodes.name: AI Makhtoob
episodes.overview: The series reaches a gripping climax as the shocking revelation alters Ravi's perspective forever. The pursuit of justice not only brings the truth to light but also confronts viewers with the darkness within themselves.

episodes.name: Pathar
episodes.overview: In the emotionally charged finale, the true monster behind the acid attack is unveiled, exposing the harrowing consequences of patriarchal oppression and collective guilt in society.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Portrays the life of a determined police officer trying to bust an acid attack case while juggling his work-life balance.
